info.title: Installing and using the Migration Toolkit for Applications Pathfinder

abstract.para: The Migration Toolkit for Applications (MTA) Pathfinder enables you to refactor your applications for Kubernetes.

preface.title: Making open source more inclusive
preface.simpara: Red Hat is committed to replacing problematic language in our code, documentation, and web properties. We are beginning with these four terms: master, slave, blacklist, and whitelist. Because of the enormity of this endeavor, these changes will be implemented gradually over several upcoming releases. For more details, see our CTO Chris Wrightâ€™s message.

chapter.title: About the Migration Toolkit for Applications Pathfinder
